[[a song, just any song]]

I was just thinkin of something random, this'll be hard for most people but what song do you think will suit me?

[[die you fu*king b!tch!]]

GRRR stupid fucking sluts n bitches fucking up relationships... Off to kill another lil bitch that TOM likes, not for much longer sunshine. She is no good for you and I would rather have you being with someone you don't love other than someone you reckon you have feelings for.
Anyway, back to the subject. I will seriously have HUGE words with this skank, so what if she is one fucking year older, she shouldn't fuck with my friends. Stupid rat.

[[i'm sorry, but i have to]]

Yeah... another lot of depressing shit to add to my page. Fuck me I feel so.. depressed. Yeah, first time in a week. I really thought I was actually getting happier and not letting things get to me n having me showing it. Well I guess that's not happening.

... What do I feel like doing now? ...
- Cutting
- Strangling
- Dying

Simple as that.

[[& I can't be away for about an hour]]

WOW I come back from havin a lil break from here and I have 3 people on MSN that added me. I AM SO FUCKING MAD.
OH and Tom's whore, Nikki [sorry, in a fucking shit all mood, probably don't mean half this shit] uhm I was just asked to blacklist you... UHM excuse me well your the one thats blocked me. Sorry for being the lil fucked up whore alright and you being the perfect lil bitch!

& so I will continue to be the ugly one, the one that doesn't get the attention she needs. Yeah wow, what a great life I have. I try killing myself, uhm, no attention there, just getting yelled at, yeah, wicked shit. I cut, wow, labelled being a fucking emo slut. WICKED! I love life. Wow, I am a great lier!

I am sick of everyone's fucking shit with me. What has the depressed one done? Be depressed and done shit wrong to other people but then I am the one getting all the shit from everyone, me being the fucking bad one just because I am the one getting the blame. [[sorry for not being the perfect fucking bitch!]]

If I killed myself would anyone care? I think not. I mean, who would? I'm just the little fucked up bitch that only gets people going off at her, getting abused. Woooooow!

[[attention seeker... me]]

That's it. I'll be what you want me to be. An attention seeker. Yep, I'll do it. Its so easy. I have a fucked up life, lost the only one I have fucking loved [[Tom]]. My heart was instantly ripped in two. Nobody cared. So all I done was wish that I'd fucking die.

I am ugly, I've got nothing that a guy wants. Whats the point of me being here? Having jack shit people who fucking care. I am only used.

My life is a continued heartache, I always hurt. I will always be heart broken. I have nothing worth living for. I cry myself to sleep every fucking night. I pray that I wont awake in the fucking morning. But nobody will care.

[[Na??a? <3`]]

Yes,, I am still single LOL this is a uhm friend lil blog thing & coz Nathan is much special he deserves the first one xD

Ever since we had started talking I have felt that little bit happier. Things are still going a little bad with Tom & I. So yeah, Tom's got Nikki; I've got Nathan. I guess we are even. I don't know why but right from I started talking to Nathan I knew I could talk to him about anything. Very weird.

If anyone messes with him, I will mess with them & nothing will stop me. He sends the messages I wake up to every morning, that makes me wanna get up out of bed and not feeling so depressed locked in a dark room. I reckon everyone will be like "its love at first sight" or something like that, with what I am about to say... He has been on my mind right from when I started talking to him.

He is amazing, I love him [[AS A FRIEND]]

||` [[I love you *more* Nathan.<3`]] `||

||` Tom... For gods sake `||

All what we have done lately is fight? [[because of me right?]] I haven't done shit wrong. Wait, yes I have, according to you I have done shit wrong... [[oops, my bad]]

Alright, Tom, for gods sake, I DON'T hate you. If I did I wouldn't have you on MSN anymore and I wouldn't text you. I have tried being friends with you, but you obviously can't see that. Anything I have said isn't in a bitchy way alright? I thought it was obvious, but obviously not obvious enough for you.

I don't wanna lose our friendship because you know everything about me, the only one that knows everything. I can't just let that one person disappear from my life. Yeah, so I am not perfect, I think we all know that. You go off at me for the smallest things... I mean WTF yeah you have Nicole from here that you talk to and yeah wow, I have Nathan. Whats the big fuss? There is none. I am still trying to get it through my head that your the one that doesn't love me anymore and that we aren't together. But us fighting alot isn't helping me.

Yeah, so I have seen that you have obviously gone off to Nicole that your happy... Well why don't you show it to me? If I am such a god friend to you then do it. If not, don't....

Well I kinda expect a reply so 1) I know you have read this and 2) so I know exactly where I stand.

[[` nice_guy01 `]]

Nice? Yeah, so I thought.
Right, so you fucking tell me that your going to hospital but NOW you have a fucking gf... so thats your way in ditching me? THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH!... [[just what I wanted, much appreciated... NOT]]

Nice guy my mother fucking ass!

||` I am really a..... `||

Hmm... So the day has come to let you all know that I am really a........

Fairy.

||` This is me... `||

Well this is my song... I am serious... If you know me well enough you should understand.

Well if you wanted honesty, that's all you had to say.
I never want to let you down or have you go, it's better off this way.
For all the dirty looks, the photographs your boyfriend took,
Remember when you broke your foot from jumping out the second floor?

I'm not okay
I'm not okay
I'm not okay
You wear me out

What will it take to show you that it's not the life it seems?
(I'm not okay)
I've told you time and time again you sing the words but don't know what it means
(I'm not okay)
To be a joke and look, another line without a hook
I held you close as we both shook for the last time take a good hard look!

I'm not okay
I'm not okay
I'm not okay
You wear me out

Forget about the dirty looks
The photographs your boyfriend took
You said you read me like a book, but the pages all are torn and frayed

I'm okay
I'm okay!
I'm okay, now
(I'm okay, now)

But you really need to listen to me
Because I'm telling you the truth
I mean this, I'm okay!
(Trust Me)

I'm not okay
I'm not okay
Well, I'm not okay
I'm not o-fucking-kay
I'm not okay
I'm not okay
(Okay)

||` A true story `||

I RAN AWAY WITH....A DILDO....WHEN I WAS FIVE...BECAUSE IT TURNED ME ON....

||` Angry much? `||

Hmm so I thought today may have been a alright day... Oh dear, how wrong was I?!
So in a class, someone leans on me, [[while I have sore as friggen legs]] I tell them NICELY to get off. Do they? NO! So I go off my face. Then what? She leans on my INFECTED toe... I tell her, "don't, thats my infected toe" so what does she do? PUNCH IT!

Before a class, I get a message from Tom saying something about me being with "some guy" [[HI "some guy"!]] and I am like "FFS I AM NOT WITH ANYONE!" well some more but I can't think of what I said... Each locker I walked past got a punch. Sore fist/knuckle? NO!

I am walking around waiting for my bus, a group of BOGAN'S ask for my number. I am like NO! Ohhh wait then they followed me a bit... GRRR OH!

I get home and mum starts yelling at me... Hmm wicked.

||` I laugh in your face `||

So, I am emo now, I have been told so. I emo bitch infact. Go me. w00t. Check my guestbook, you'll see.

But now, I am goth as well... Friggen awesome! Erhum... Okay....

..................... NEWSFLASH! .....................

I'm not a mother fucking label!

So what if I cut? So what if the low life has somehow got the photos of them and felt tough by uploading them on her page [[I am talking about "urdead"]]

Now for that random who asked me why I would pick to carve death in my leg? Uhm wake up sunshine, its called depression and being suicidal. WAS SUCH A LOVELY TALK WITH YOU LAST NIGHT... not. I am so great at lying.
